description: A standard text input field for forms.

props.name: label
props.description: The label to display above the input field.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder text to display inside the input field.

props.name: value
props.description: The current value of the input.

props.name: onChangeText
props.description: Callback function that is called when the text changes.

props.name: isSecure
props.description: If true, the text will be obscured for password inputs.

props.name: error
props.description: An error message to display below the input field.
